Too many hackers in Dangerzone.  

EDIT:  Upon further review (9.9K hours), I have determined this game to be infested with cheater noobs.  Valve certainly does not do enough, but their efforts are noted yet lacking, given the $2,500,000 per day that Valve enjoys.  I recommend Valorant or a competitor to the CSGO game.

Valve, you never go after the cheat software "gamesense/skeet" or the Chinese variant "680".  These are widely used programs, and should be easy to setup a file in game to detect.  My suspicions are that programmers at Valve are either lazy or incompetent, because any college student these days in programming, is making a cheat for this game to help pay for their school.
